summary: This is an email exchange from December 10, 2018, between an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and an FBI recipient, scheduling a brief call to discuss items in preparation for an unspecified event on Wednesday.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, working in the Southern District of New York, requests a brief call with the FBI recipient to discuss items in preparation for an upcoming Wednesday event.

events.title: Preparation for Wednesday Event

keyFacts: The email is dated December 10, 2018, and references preparation for an event on the upcoming Wednesday (December 12, 2018).

The correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and an FBI recipient, indicating coordination between the DOJ and FBI regarding the Epstein case.
The email's subject is 'Re: Epstein', confirming the discussion pertains to the Epstein investigation.
The location of the U.S. Attorney's office is specified as One Saint Andrew's Plaza in New York, NY.
